body: Oof, her constantly bringing up the younger brother hurt my soul...
It is actually smooth NTR in the third part, hope it never get translated...
How is this ntr?

Tomboy? Tanlines? Fitness? It's all perfect... except for that part everyone is complaining about. I know it's a doujin I could easily forget and ignore, but my life is ruined forever. How could we accept a hentai only being a 9/10?

left a bad taste in my mouth. the younger brother could've been omitted entirely from the story but they chose to put him in to make the reader feel sympathy for him. so fucking convoluted! The girl also didn't get with the younger brother in the end to add insult to injury. Girl's already fucking with the older brother yet snidbits of the young bro still pops-up from time to time. Fucking depressing... The guy even asked her out at the end! Wonder how he's gonna react to his brother dating her.

This is the best NTR I ever read it Realistic and smart.Kill her with kindness.

By far my least favorite syoukaki work. Not because it's ntr but because of just how boring it is. It feels like a repetitions of plots that I have seen before. Now I know that syoukaki has used other author's plots accidentally or non-accidentally but the way he transforms his works from generic to something wonderful is amazing. I mean the gal girl who wants her boyfriend to be aggressive is a work that kumano tooru has done before. However when it comes to netori or netorare series authors never really sticked to something fresh. It's either some typical "I have a bigger cock so 
You're mine now lmao" plot "I'm blackmailing you so kneel down" and the worst and most lazy of all is the "first come first serve" now don't get me wrong when an ntr is done well it is great. Katsura airi had some great ntr works, otome doori to this day is still is my favorite also with rinkan club and pinkerton. But most of them followed the same plot and the same execution. A very mediocre work 5/10
@transguyjackelope i disagreed at first but then read the rest and now I'm full on with you.
some of you get very emotionally torn up by these porn comics with barely any plot in them, it's hilarious and stupid

Because in normal harems the boy can dip his dick in all the girls without any major downsides, but in reverse harem only 3 holes for who knows how many manwhores and only can get pregnant by 1 at the same time, so at the end of the day the girl in reverse harem just looks like a slut who likes to get gangbanged. You like sluts? I don't. Reverse harem is trash. Also, kinda NTR vibes from this one, but I'm ok, all the characters are dumb, so nothing was lost.

That was some strange covert cucking. I'm all for artistic freedom but this felt pointless. If you want to make a cuck doujinshi then just go all the way, at least then it's gonna be tagged and you're gonna spare a lot of people a lot of suffering. The way it is now the cucks are disappointed because it's too soft and not tagged and vanillafags are disappointed because it's borderline NTR but soft enough to get past the tagging system. Loved the art but this was disgusting.

I'm not getting these "bad vibes" everyone is talking about from her senpai. He's pretty assertive and definitely seems to have been with other girls but that's not necessarily bad. Also a little drama in a hentai isn't that bad. Certainly better than just random sex because sex needs to happen and seems to be a simple theme of, "you snooze you lose" with the little brother. Would perfer she just went out with both of them. There's not enough of the girl getting a harem without being a depraved slut or raped into submission.

Read the raws and I agree with the other comments below. What's the point of adding the lil bro's perspective? It feels like a really cheap or lazy way to add some drama to the story. The two definitely looks happy with one another despite the weird vibe the senpai is showing.

If he shows his good side, it will feel better for me but nope, the author kept the bad vibe till the end. Hmm... Maybe that's just how the girl likes it? Since this is only shown in the girl's perspective so she's happy with her senpai bad vibes I guess? We never know what senpai actually thought after all

@Curiosity Killed the Cat huh ... Not NTR at all.  but it was too late to realize there was a feeling between lil bro and that tomboy girl.  Still, once I got into this situation irl, it didn't hurt as much as gettin' cuckolded.

If you read the 3rd chapter, it will feels like the other brother is getting NTR'd but no, senpai only wants to protect his girl, I mean they are already dating. He immediately force her to shoot down his brother's confession (through phone while fucking her) to show her that she is his. But seriously though, the senpai really gives a bad vibe, that's the only thing that I don't like. Throughout the chapters, I see that senpai really acted like a boyfriend but the vibe he gives looks like that guy who only see women as sex toys. Why the hell the author only shows that? At least shows his good side or something. I'm not surprised if people said "what a waste of good tomboy" thanks to that

Oh yeah additionally, it kinda his own fault. I mean the other brother always seems bored whenever he's with her even though it's kinda shown that she's trying to get his attention. Well, senpai shows his care for her and you know the rule and so do I

If I remember correctly, the other brother confessed to her in the 3rd chapter. She was baffled at first with kinda sorta mixed between surprised and regret (maybe realizing she had feeling for him but it's too late since she's already taken). She picked her senpai though after the senpai fucked her again while she is calling her brother. A little sad, but well senpai just advanced faster I guess. Moreover, she admired him too so it makes him easier to take a move on her as it's shown here.
It's second day of NNN, but here i am... darn. Anyway, this one hella hot, not gonna lie!

The rest of the chapters (not translated yet) are in the recent tankubon of this artist, those who might want to see how the story continues can get a good idea of it just from the images, #334128 that's the number.
